languages.text: "Вы слишком добры ко мне, Ваша Светлость. Сейчас есть дела поважнее, чем пара сломанных ребер. Прошу, не беспокойтесь об этом".

traits.locale_text: "Вы слишком добры ко мне, Ваша Светлость. Сейчас есть дела поважнее, чем пару сломанных ребер. Прошу, не беспокойтесь об этом".

languages.text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."
languages.original_text: "Вы слишком добры ко мне, Ваша Светлость. Сейчас есть дела поважнее, чем пара сломанных ребер. Прошу, не беспокойтесь об этом".

traits.locale_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not worry yourself about it."
"You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not worry yourself about it."
"You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."
"You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."
"You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

languages.text: 「なんと慈悲深いのでしょう、陛下。あばら骨が数本折れただけで、他に重要なことはございます。どうかご心配なさらず」
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: 「なんと慈悲深いのでしょう、陛下。あばら骨が数本折れただけで、他に重要なことはございます。どうかご心配なさらず」

languages.text: “您实在是太仁慈了，大人。眼下我们还有更重要的事情要处理，断几根肋骨实在不值一提。请不必为我担心。”
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: “您实在是太仁慈了，大人。眼下我们还有更重要的事情要处理，断几根肋骨实在不值一提。请不必为我担心。”

languages.text: «Es demasiado amable conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tenemos asuntos más importantes que atender que unas costillas rotas, no se moleste».
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: «Es demasiado amable conmigo, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Tenemos asuntos más importantes que atender que unas costillas rotas, no se moleste».

languages.text: « Votre sollicitude me touche, Votre Seigneurie, mais il y a plus grave que quelques côtes cassées. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour moi. »
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: « Votre sollicitude me touche, Votre Seigneurie, mais il y a plus grave que quelques côtes cassées. Ne vous inquiétez pas pour moi. »

languages.text: "Ihr seid zu freundlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir müssen uns um Wichtigeres kümmern als ein paar gebrochene Rippen. Bitte bekümmert Euch deshalb nicht."
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr seid zu freundlich, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Wir müssen uns um Wichtigeres kümmern als ein paar gebrochene Rippen. Bitte bekümmert Euch deshalb nicht."

languages.text: "Çok naziksiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İki kaburga kemiğim kırılmış, ne çıkar? Önümüzde daha önemli meseleler var. Rica ediyorum, endişelenmeyin."
languages.original_text: "You are too kind to me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. We have more important matters to consider than a few broken ribs. Please do not trouble yourself about it."

traits.locale_text: "Çok naziksiniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İki kaburga kemiğim kırılmış, ne çıkar? Önümüzde daha önemli meseleler var. Rica ediyorum, endişelenmeyin."
